data.text:
Ethiopian Cargo is an outstanding global air cargo & logistic service provider, serving more than 65 destinations worldwide using ultra-modern aircraft.
#Ethiopiancargo #Cargowithcare #Pharmawing https://t.co/FFwZzXlpr7

We are delighted to announce our new partnership with Ker Ezhi Ethiopia. Earn double bonus miles until October 30, 2022 every time you purchase leather products from Ker Ezhi Ethiopia. 

 https://t.co/2Kxnd4MbLO https://t.co/OCweiQoofn

We have been flying for over seven decades and continue to be aviation pioneers!
#ThrowbackThursday #BackintheDays https://t.co/RUn89Uadde

urls.title: Boeing Signs 787 Landing Gear Exchange Agreement with Ethiopian Airlines
urls.description: Boeing solidified a contract agreement for the 787 Landing Gear Exchange Program with Ethiopian Airlines during a signing ceremony at the Farnborough Air Show. The new contract includes 19 787-8 landing gear exchanges.

data.text:

data.text:
Drive premium and earn up to 2000 miles on your next car rental with SIXT from July 14, 2022 to September 14, 2022. 
Present your ShebaMiles card or your ShebaMiles number when you book the car rental to get miles.
Click to learn more. https://t.co/AOicBnI6ov
#ShebaMiles https://t.co/TUVgMjj7sg

data.text:
The window seat brings the best views. This beautiful shot was taken by @iamparay thank you for sharing.
#WindowViewWednesday #ETMoments https://t.co/S0m45d2jX8

Ethiopian Airlines Group, the largest cargo network operator in Africa, has been nominated in Cargo airline of the year & Best cargo airline in Africa Award categories.
Click https://t.co/nLaOAz2hfg and vote for #Ethiopian!
#ethiopiancargo #cargowithcare https://t.co/kihF9FcjHn

Follow that smile!

#FlyEthiopian https://t.co/MRG6D2hzSW
When it comes to your comfort and well being, the Ethiopian Airlines staff is always one step ahead. #FlyEthiopian https://t.co/qpaS44CyKO

We have launched our very first Recipe Book “Fly Ethiopian, Go Organic !” on a colorful event at Ethiopian Skylight Hotel. This Recipe Book is aimed at promoting the authentic Ethiopian indigenous cuisine and beverages to the world through simple step by step procedures. https://t.co/87aF06mlQU

urls.title: Awash ShebaMiles Co-branded Card
urls.description: When autocomplete results are available use up and down arrows to review and enter to select. We would like to regularly send you information about topics relevant for you. Please approve our use of your personal information by selecting your preferred communication method from the following. For more information on our Privacy Policy, please , click here You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. ShebaMiles Newsletter The regular ShebaMiles ShebaMiles Newsletter brings you : Latest promotions

data.text:
The window view always offers a unique sight!  We thank @AltafSh23877906 for today's #ETmoments. Share your photos or videos, tag us using #ETMoments, we will be happy to share them back with you.
 #FlyEthiopian #Windowviewwednesday https://t.co/eEYiBFNXBg

Ethiopian inaugural flight to Chennai received a warm welcome from Officials of the Tourism Ministry of India, Honourable guests and Ethiopian staff in India. 
#FlyEthiopian #chennai #inaugural https://t.co/pn5CLaT8xv
